summary: A pipeline class that generates concise summaries of news articles and other textual documents by leveraging pre‑trained transformer models fine‑tuned for summarization tasks. It abstracts model loading, tokenization, and generation, allowing users to specify length constraints and other generation parameters.
business_intent: Enable applications such as news aggregation, content curation, and information digest services to automatically produce short, readable summaries from longer texts, improving user engagement and information accessibility.
